section.p: This template represents planned observations that result in new information about the patient which cannot be classified as a procedure according to the HL7 RIM, i.e., procedures alter the patient's body. Examples of these observations are laboratory tests, diagnostic imaging tests, EEGs, and EKGs. The importance of the planned observation to the patient and provider is communicated through Priority Preference. The effectiveTime indicates the time when the observation is intended to take place and authorTime indicates when the documentation of the plan occurred. The Planned Observation template may also indicate the potential insurance coverage for the observation.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-30451, CONF:1098-30452, CONF:1098-32555 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.44"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Activity Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.44)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Planned moodCode (Observation) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.25 STATIC 2011-09-30 (CONF:1098-8582)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-31030)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-30453)/@code="active" Active (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-32032)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-30454)
The effectiveTime in a planned observation represents the time that the observation should occur.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1098-31031)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:1098-32043)
In a planned observation the provider may suggest that an observation should be performed using a particular method.

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32044)
The targetSiteCode is used to identify the part of the body of concern for the planned observation.

MAY contain [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-30456)
The clinician who is expected to perform the observation could be identified using procedure/performer.
Conforms to Performer2 from CDA

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32033)
The author in a planned observation represents the clinician who is requesting or planning the observation.
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31073, CONF:1098-31074, CONF:1098-31075)
The following entryRelationship represents the priority that a patient or a provider places on the observation.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Priority Preference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32034, CONF:1098-32035, CONF:1098-32036)
The following entryRelationship represents the indication for the observation.
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32037, CONF:1098-32038, CONF:1098-32039)
The following entryRelationship captures any instructions associated with the planned observation.
This entryRelationship captures any instructions associated with the planned observation.
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32040, CONF:1098-32041, CONF:1098-32042)
The following entryRelationship represents the insurance coverage the patient may have for the observation.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Planned Coverage (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.129)
SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Activity Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.44)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8581, R2.0=CONF:1098-8581)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Planned moodCode (Observation) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.25 STATIC 2011-09-30 (CONF:1098-8582)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8584, R2.0=CONF:1098-8584)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-31030)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-30453)/@code="active" Active (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-32032)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-30454)
The effectiveTime in a planned observation represents the time that the observation should occur.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1098-31031)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:1098-32043)
In a planned observation the provider may suggest that an observation should be performed using a particular method.

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] targetSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32044)
The targetSiteCode is used to identify the part of the body of concern for the planned observation.

MAY contain [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-30456)
Conforms to Performer2 from CDA
The clinician who is expected to perform the observation could be identified using procedure/performer.

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32033)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
The author in a planned observation represents the clinician who is requesting or planning the observation.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31073, CONF:1098-31074, CONF:1098-31075)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Priority Preference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143)
The following entryRelationship represents the priority that a patient or a provider places on the observation.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32034, CONF:1098-32035, CONF:1098-32036)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)
The following entryRelationship represents the indication for the observation.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32037, CONF:1098-32038, CONF:1098-32039)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)
The following entryRelationship captures any instructions associated with the planned observation.
This entryRelationship captures any instructions associated with the planned observation.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32040, CONF:1098-32041, CONF:1098-32042)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Planned Coverage (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.129)
The following entryRelationship represents the insurance coverage the patient may have for the observation.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8583, CONF:10512 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.44"
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Plan Of Care Activity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8581, R2.0=CONF:1098-8581)

Consol Plan Of Care Activity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Plan of Care moodCode (Observation) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.25 STATIC (CONF:8582)
Consol Plan Of Care Activity Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8584, R2.0=CONF:1098-8584)
